name: The Trans-Fu Affair
description:
The Trans-Fu Affair was made by TeamTP for the 2018 Mashup Jam. It is a work of Parody, therefore 100% free to play. The game is inspired by two films, the Rocky Horror Picture Show, and Kung Pow: Enter the Fist. 

DISCLAIMER: There are a few bugs such as invisible walls. If you entounter an invisible wall do not worry, the game can still be completed. Just move around until you find a way around an invisible wall, or use your mouse to navigate to completely bypass the invisible walls.

Controls:

Arrows =Move 

Shift=Speed+ Punch 

Z= interact
